<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Tough Skin](/Feats.aspx?ID=3969) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Kashrishi" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=462" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 44</row>

**Prerequisites**
[Lethoci](/Heritages.aspx?ID=212) heritage or [Xyloshi](/Heritages.aspx?ID=215) heritage

</column>

---

Your skin is medium armor in the [plate](/ArmorGroups.aspx?ID=4) armor group that grants a +4 item bonus to AC, and has a Dex cap of +1, a check penalty of –2, a Speed penalty of –5 feet, a Strength value of 16, and the [comfort](/Traits.aspx?ID=203) trait. You can never wear other armor or remove your hide. You can etch armor runes onto your hide.

 If you're a lethoci kashrishi who takes this feat, your modifications also make you more buoyant, allowing you to [Swim](/Actions.aspx?ID=39) across the surface of even turbulent bodies of water without needing to make an [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) check.

**Special** You can take this feat only at 1st level, and you can't retrain into this feat.
name: Tough Skin
